content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs per the latest command, I attempted to clone the Arabic sample program repository from the URL "https://github.com/learnarabic/arabic-sample-program.git" to the path "/home/atlas/arabic-sample-program", but received an error message stating that the repository could not be found. In response, I searched for Arabic language programs for beginners using the "google" command, which returned a list of websites offering such programs.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.middlebury.edu/language-schools/languages/arabic", "question": "What are the Arabic language programs for beginners offered by Middlebury Language Schools?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Middlebury Language Schools offers an 8-week immersion program for beginner to advanced students who want to improve their Arabic language proficiency. The program is located on the Bennington campus and offers classes in Modern Standard Arabic with optional classes in colloquial dialects such as Moroccan, Egyptian, and Syrian. \n \n Links: ['\\n        Skip to content\\n       (https://www.middlebury.edu/language-schools/languages/arabic#midd-main)', 'Privacy Policy (https://go.middlebury.edu/privacy)', '\\n\\nMiddlebury Language Schools\\n (https://www.middlebury.edu/language-schools/)', 'Our Languages (https://www.middlebury.edu/language-schools/languages)', 'Abenaki (https://www.middlebury.edu/language-schools/languages/abenaki)']"}]
"""
